meanings.definition: The condition in which a single organism possesses both male and female reproductive structures.
meanings.sent1: Homothallism allows an organism to have both male and female parts.
meanings.sent2: In homothallism, an organism can reproduce using its own structures.
meanings.sent3: The plant joked that its homothallism made dating unnecessary.
meanings.sent4: The concept of homothallism is like being your own matchmaker in nature.
meanings.sent5: Homothallism is like having a built-in reproductive system for convenience.

meanings.definition: The ability of an organism to self-fertilize.
meanings.sent1: Self-fertilization is possible due to homothallism.
meanings.sent2: Homothallism enables an organism to fertilize itself.
meanings.sent3: The snail with homothallism didn't need a partner for family gatherings.
meanings.sent4: The idea of homothallism is like having a solo dance party of reproduction.
meanings.sent5: Homothallism is nature's way of saying, 'I got this, no need for help!'
